name: Community Development Financial Institutions Rapid Response Program (CDFI RRP)
objective: To support the ability of Community Development Financial Institutions (CDFIs) to support, prepare for, and respond to the economic impact of the coronavirus.
applicant_types: Private nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)

authorizations.text: Coronavirus Response and Relief Supplemental Appropriations Act of 2021, The Coronavirus Response and Relief Supplemental Appropriations Act of 2021 (P.L. 116-260).

rules_regulations:
The Coronavirus Response and Relief Supplemental Appropriations Act of 2021 (P.L. 116-260)
NOFA; and application materials.
